import React, {Component} from "react"; import {ApiMenus} from '../services/apirest'; import axios from 'axios'; class EditarMenu extends Component{ state = { form:{ "id": "", "code": "", "stock": "", "name": "", "namefood": "", "description": "", "amount": "", "image": "", "is_available": "", }, error:false, errorMsg:"" } manejadorChange = async e => { await this.setState({ form:{ ...this.state.form, [e.target.name]: e.target.value } }) } manejadorSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault(); } componentDidMount(){ let idMenu = this.props.match.params.id; let url = ApiMenus + idMenu; axios.get(url) .then( response => { this.setState({ form:{ id: response.data.id, code: response.data.category.code, namefood: response.data.category.name, name: response.data.name, description: response.data.description, amount: response.data.price.amount, image: response.data.image, is_available: response.data.is_available, } }) }); } render(){ return(

Editar Menu










Salir
); } } export default EditarMenu;
